channel.title: I Need a Compiler
channel.description:
Ok, someone told me I need a new compiler since I got this message:
"You do not have JDK 5.0 or JDK 6.0 or any JDK 5.0 and 6.0 updates. Go to Mod Taharok's tutorial on Moparscape tutorials section for step-by-step instruction to download the newest JDK update. Press any key to continue..."
And, I need help on where to get a new compiler. Please, anyone?

item.title: I Need a Compiler
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

bacus, when you help some1 its better for us all if you teach in the process, dont encourage C&P
and echo Fininshed! = useless

Read full topic

item.title: I Need a Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito
item.description:
@Incognito wrote:

Ok, see check this… I edit my NPC’s text that they say, then I compile it… And I turn my server on, and get on, and the text is still the same… What am I doing wrong?

Read full topic

item.title: I Need a Compiler
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

Open up your source folder>Go on File on the top>Hover your mouse to New>There should be a few things you can click like briefcase,microsoft word document, find text document and click it>It should be the last folder in your source folder>double click it and and copy and paste the code>Go on file and do Save As…>For name, put compile.bat> After that, put for folder type, All files. May of been hard but I have to go sorry :\

Read full topic

item.title: I Need a Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

right click compiler.bat

click edit

and replace all of it with this @echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit

Read full topic

item.title: I Need a Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Incognito Incognito

item.title: I Need a Compiler
item.dc:creator: @Bacus23 Bacus23
item.description:
@Bacus23 wrote:

no replace your compiler with this @echo off if exist "%programfiles%\Java" (call :compile "%programfiles%\Java\") else (goto error) :compile for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe") if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java) if defined p (goto end) :error echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load. "%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe" http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp :end echo Finished! pause exit[code][/code]

Read full topic

item.title: I Need a Compiler

item.description:

item.title: I Need a Compiler
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

@echo off
title ServerNameHere Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

Make a new document with notepad and copy and paste this to it. That is for jdk6u2, depends on what update you have. If you have 3 then put
@echo off
title ServerNameHere Compiler
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
pause

etc, just change the 2 to a 3 for update 3 or change the 3 to a 4 for update 4

Read full topic
